channel.title: Need a 24/7 hoster
channel.description:
[b]Rune-Live[/b] [i]Hi guys. Ever heard of Rune-Live? No? me neither, until today. They need a hoster for their new server. It's being released as soon as they get a hoster and if that's you, get a move on and post below. It's owned by Barrage_Time, so you can bet you bottom dollar (or pound) that this server will be top dog.[/i]
[i]The hoster needs to be 24/7. Must be NO-IP. Not Hamachi.[/i]
[b]Features:[/b] [i] - It's a PK server, but he's working on adding skills. - Godswords with emotes. - Skillcapes - Good economy, despite being a PK server.
The person who succeeds in becoming get instant admin.
To apply, post below of PM me. I'll then put you in touch with barrage-time.[/i]
.oO0Oo. [b] Many Thanks,
Syrillia + Barrage_Time.[/b]
[b]*edit* Thread rule, PM flames to me. So I can delete them ;)[/b]

item.title: Need a 24/7 hoster
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:1, topic:175785”]Rune-Live
Hi guys. Ever heard of Rune-Live? No? me neither, until today. They need a hoster for their new server. It’s being released as soon as they get a hoster and if that’s you, get a move on and post below. It’s owned by Barrage_Time, so you can bet you bottom dollar (or pound) that this server will be top dog.

The hoster needs to be 24/7.
Must be NO-IP. Not Hamachi.

Features:
[i] - It’s a PK server, but he’s working on adding skills.

  • Godswords with emotes.
  • Skillcapes
  • Good economy, despite being a PK server.

The person who succeeds in becoming get instant admin.

To apply, post below of PM me. I’ll then put you in touch with barrage-time.[/i]

.oO0Oo.
[b]
Many Thanks,

Syrillia + Barrage_Time.[/b]

edit
Thread rule, PM flames to me. So I can delete them [/quote]

I just quit mine. I can do it for 24/7.
I have 1000GB bandwidth.
I have an empty Desktop computer great for hosting.
Non-Lag.
I can run it for 1-3 years straight.

Requirements…
Just an auto restarter. (Working).
To reduce lag =-)

Read full topic

item.title: Need a 24/7 hoster

item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

Alright, if your going to send an email, send it to coolmanawesome@gmail.com please…

Also i have 1500gb of bandwidth (Thats 150x a reg computer’s internet speed) and 2gb ram…
